title: Zed buffed again on pbe: you're kidding me?

replies.body: You are right. It's a strange buff. Something tells me more is going on here.
It's a bug!
**Sigh** gotta put back my pitchfork now

> **Sigh** gotta put back my pitchfork now

upvoted, starting a riot on Riot
if you do that riot may realease their Riots {{champion:75}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:10}}  who ever else

> It's a bug!

Yes, those numbers were meant to be higher. Expect the fix by tomorrow's PBE update.
Well... worlds are coming, so...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJgVat1H,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:28:10.374+0000)

> It's a bug!

Thank Buddha
Mistakes are paid with blood...

Riot person! Have you guys ever thought about making assassin characters like Zed less safe? Being able to 100-0 some one and teleport away with he press of 1 button negates the the high skill cap Zed is supposed to have by being able to dive brainlessly when ahead. Same with Fizz and his 4.8 sec get out of jail free card, allows players too much safety when they make mistakes. I feel like assassins should not be able to be easy to play.
CertainlyT must be giving some high quality handjobs to the balance team for that outrageously strong buff.
Actually I think it might be the new "brojob" that is being talked about on the internet.
Remember, no homo is a lie.
I thought it was no hetero?
Sure it isn't no Poly?
All the people against polygamy are Christians, but the bible is like ya he had a couple hundred wives. #nomonogomy.
pics or it didn't happen.
If Corki or trinity force get a buff you'll know.
why? I don't get this

It seem every year shortly before worlds there is always a certain pattern to balance patches. It usually starts with Lee, Zed and Corki.

Looks like they wanna get certain champs on screen.

Every year.
"zed"

Hyperbole?

B-But muh {{item:3157}} 
But muh {{item:3140}}

This is a prime example of overacting.  People forget that the PBE doesn't necessarily mean it's going to live.

Edit:  Love the downvotes by people claiming to be done with league because of a potential (yes, potential, not an actual buff yet) buff they don't like.
Yeah, i mean its not like bad feedback is NOT gonna change it right? {{champion:82}}

I'm feeling so pissed right now, of all the champions who need attention they ha to buff zed

OK {{champion:33}}
That buff has to be followed with a CD nerf. I don't see any reason how that buff can be remotely balanced. 280 damage on a 4 second CD is just way too good.

Good god, that's a pretty damn huge buff. 100 more damage late-game on a short CD? They just recently nerfed Evelyn's Q too...

I really hope it gives with a CD and an energy cost per skill point nerf for that kind of power boost.

> [{quoted}](name=SouL1ess,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJgVat1H,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-20T19:26:49.906+0000)
>
> That buff has to be followed with a CD nerf. I don't see any reason how that buff can be remotely balanced. 280 damage on a 4 second CD is just way too good.

I just realised that his Q has 235 damage, with 6 seconds. Now with this buff just max E and rush your oppenent at lvl 6
riot logic
I'll believe its a bug when it gets reverted back to where it was.  Those numbers look EXTREMELY INTENTIONAL.
Do you really thank a Rioter would straight up lie on the forums?

> [{quoted}](name=DragoonRuin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJgVat1H,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:45:33.125+0000)
>
> I'll believe its a bug when it gets reverted back to where it was.  Those numbers look EXTREMELY INTENTIONAL.

There was also the time Frost Queen's Claim got a RIDICULOUS buff and granted some absurd GP10 iirc; which was a bug.

Its probably a bug, even if it looks intentional, these things happen, and have happened before.

Besides, think how bad it would look to OPENLY lie.

**PROJECT: Zed
1350 RP **

There's your context
Gotta sell those new project skins after all.

Same as why fiora got buffs this quickly and Devourer's not being addressed:
PROJECT SKINS!

> [{quoted}](name=Shroom of Dooom,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJgVat1H,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:03:43.785+0000)
>

i forgot it

I... please tell me I fell through a time vortex back to april first.

edit: missed the riot post somehow first time through. Still a bit wary though, the ever-worsening minion pathing issues since around fizz patch, were said to be a bug by riot, but they were never fixed and in fact kept getting worse.
Riot is really pissing me off at this point

Riot polishes "#LCSBIGPLAYS" champions before worlds.
1st Lee Skill now Zed.. E by 100 dmg? Holy shit, like hes not one shoting squishes hard enough.
Oh and another Azir nerf... as if losing his e knock up wasn't bad enough. I feel sick :(
